questions.question: What hosted platform powers online stores?
questions.explanation: Shopify is a leading e-commerce hosting platform.

questions.question: Which WordPress plugin creates online stores?
questions.explanation: WooCommerce turns WordPress into an e-commerce site.

questions.question: What open-source platform offers enterprise features?
questions.explanation: Magento provides robust enterprise e-commerce solutions.

questions.question: What Shopify feature automates order fulfillment?
questions.explanation: Shopify Fulfillment handles shipping and delivery.

questions.question: Which platform uses themes for design?
questions.explanation: All major platforms support customizable themes.

questions.question: What extends platform functionality?
questions.explanation: Plugins add features to e-commerce platforms.

questions.question: Which Shopify plan supports unlimited products?
questions.explanation: All Shopify plans allow unlimited products.

questions.question: What tracks customer purchases?
questions.explanation: Analytics monitor sales and customer behavior.
